name: AzureAppConfiguration
description: Download KV from Azure App Configuration Store
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Subscription for the Azure AppConfiguration Store

inputs.name: ConfigstoreName
inputs.label: App Configuration Store name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of an existing App Configuration Store. 27

inputs.name: KeyFilter
inputs.label: Key filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: The filter that download any key-values that matche the Key filter. [Reference for key-values query](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-app-configuration/concept-key-value#query-key-values).

inputs.name: Label
inputs.label: Label
inputs.helpMarkDown: If no label specified, show key-value with null label.
